title: Aurelion Sol's Q not functioning properly. @RIOT
body:
It says clearly in his reveal page that when someone is within his stars he is useless except for 2 options, the first being; double tap Q for an instant stun, but this is not the case in game, Starsurge has a delay before i can be re-actived, it usually has to travel at least to his inner limit before you can re-active it, which means you cant double tap it, and it is pretty much useless as a defensive technique. 
so either:

1. Starsurge is not performing as intend.

2. The champion reveal page is wrong.

So with respect to your 'clarity' Riot, could you please not leave us in the dark as to which thing is wrong? Is Starsurge bugged, or is the champion reveal page misleading?

thanks

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: page is wrong, that said something alone the lines of "there has to be a delay so he is vulnerable when they get into melee range" or something, because that is his "weakness" and the double tap stun removes that vulnerability. His ult it meant to be the only way to protect against that
it also has absolutely NO mention of a delay on the double tap before you can reactivate in the ability description

Your best bet is to post in the [Report a Bug board over on NA](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report). Just make sure you follow the[ guidelines/etiquette for the board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) and someone will see it.

Basically put a [Gameplay] tag in the title and then post what you did here.
